line_2: My patient search is well repaid,

line_1: Tho' thy voice, gentle shepherd, was clear,
line_2: Yet thy shepherdess was not so fair,

line_1: ERE this can drown the tenderest husband's eyes,
line_2: And rend the fondest lover's heart with sighs,

line_1: And rend the fondest lover's heart with sighs,

line_1: No more shall those dear names my rapture move,
line_2: Low in the grave, and deaf to thee and Love.

line_1: Low in the grave, and deaf to thee and Love.
line_2: No more shall those dear names my rapture move,

line_1: Firm in thy country's cause, thy king's defence,
line_2: When Honour call'd thy patriot virtues hence;

line_1: When Honour call'd thy patriot virtues hence;
line_2: Firm in thy country's cause, thy king's defence,

line_1: The slow disease which tainted then my blood,
line_2: In vain by all the powers of art withstood,

line_1: In vain by all the powers of art withstood,
line_2: The slow disease which tainted then my blood,

line_1: Aided by grief more deadly, creeps at length
line_2: Thro' every vein, and undermines my strength.

line_1: Thro' every vein, and undermines my strength.
line_2: Aided by grief more deadly, creeps at length

line_1: Already Death hath summon'd me away,
line_2: And Love, fond Love, scarce gains an hour's delay,

line_1: And Love, fond Love, scarce gains an hour's delay,
line_2: Already Death hath summon'd me away,

line_1: Yet without dread Death's awful call I hear,
line_2: No dark presages chill my soul with fear,

line_1: No dark presages chill my soul with fear,
line_2: Yet without dread Death's awful call I hear,

line_1: No unrepented follies dread the grave,
line_2: And one short moment more, with anguish crave,

line_1: And one short moment more, with anguish crave,
line_2: No unrepented follies dread the grave,

line_1: Prepar'd I'm call'd, from every terror free,
line_2: Save that for ever I must part from thee.

line_1: Save that for ever I must part from thee.
line_2: Prepar'd I'm call'd, from every terror free,

line_1: But when on thee my thoughts reflecting rove,
line_2: And all the pleasures of our virtuous love;

line_1: And all the pleasures of our virtuous love;
line_2: But when on thee my thoughts reflecting rove,

line_1: To think how blest we were, how soon must part,
line_2: One deep-felt pang would pierce the dullest heart;

line_1: One deep-felt pang would pierce the dullest heart;
line_2: To think how blest we were, how soon must part,

line_1: To cast one longing, lingering look behind,
line_2: Can be no guilty weakness of the mind;

line_1: Can be no guilty weakness of the mind;
line_2: To cast one longing, lingering look behind,

line_1: Methinks when heaven hath kindly blest us here,
line_2: Fond Love, at parting, sheds a pious tear.

line_1: Fond Love, at parting, sheds a pious tear.
line_2: Methinks when heaven hath kindly blest us here,

line_1: Still with each comfort will I cheer my heart,
line_2: Resign'd to God, tho' trembling to depart.

line_1: Resign'd to God, tho' trembling to depart.
line_2: Still with each comfort will I cheer my heart,

line_1: Short is man's knowledge of a future state,
line_2: Perplex'd with doubts, and ignorant of fate;

line_1: Perplex'd with doubts, and ignorant of fate;
line_2: Short is man's knowledge of a future state,

line_1: This one important truth we only know.
line_2: Bliss waits the good, the bad, eternal woe.

line_1: Bliss waits the good, the bad, eternal woe.
line_2: This one important truth we only know.

line_1: But what those blessings, what those woes shall be,
line_2: Thro' Life's dull casement since no eye can see,

line_1: Thro' Life's dull casement since no eye can see,
line_2: But what those blessings, what those woes shall be,

line_1: Let Fancy paint the raptures of the skies,
line_2: And scenes of visionary transport rise.

line_1: And scenes of visionary transport rise.
line_2: Let Fancy paint the raptures of the skies,

line_1: Still, as was ever here my fondest joy,
line_2: Let me for thee my every care employ;

line_1: Let me for thee my every care employ;
line_2: Still, as was ever here my fondest joy,

line_1: Still let me serve, and tho' unseen, be near,
line_2: Not life itself imparts a charm more dear.

line_1: Not life itself imparts a charm more dear.
line_2: Still let me serve, and tho' unseen, be near,

line_1: From every dangerous step those feet to guide,
line_2: Which here to follow was my virtuous pride;

line_1: Which here to follow was my virtuous pride;
line_2: From every dangerous step those feet to guide,

line_1: When wrath provokes, or fortune proves unkind,
line_2: To lull the raging tumults of thy mind:

line_1: To lull the raging tumults of thy mind:
line_2: When wrath provokes, or fortune proves unkind,

line_1: The sweets around of balmy sleep to shed,
line_2: When Sickness binds thee to her painful bed;

line_1: When Sickness binds thee to her painful bed;
line_2: The sweets around of balmy sleep to shed,

line_1: To guard thee safely thro' the dreadful day,
line_2: When Slaughter stalks from rank to rank for prey;

line_1: When Slaughter stalks from rank to rank for prey;
line_2: To guard thee safely thro' the dreadful day,

line_1: Still from thy breast to avert the death-fraught ball,
line_2: And bid th' uplifted weapon guiltless fall:

line_1: And bid th' uplifted weapon guiltless fall:
line_2: Still from thy breast to avert the death-fraught ball,

line_1: Still at thy side, as was my wish below,
line_2: Your Guardian-angel wheresoe'er you go.

line_1: Your Guardian-angel wheresoe'er you go.
line_2: Still at thy side, as was my wish below,

line_1: With thoughts like these my drooping soul I warm,
line_2: Plume every hope, and every fear disarm.

line_1: Plume every hope, and every fear disarm.
line_2: With thoughts like these my drooping soul I warm,

line_1: But, ah! to think what thy fond heart must feel,
line_2: When first these lines the fatal news reveal,

line_1: When first these lines the fatal news reveal,
line_2: But, ah! to think what thy fond heart must feel,

line_1: What pangs of grief will rend thy gentle breast,
line_2: Sinks my sad soul, with pain and love opprest.

line_1: Sinks my sad soul, with pain and love opprest.
line_2: What pangs of grief will rend thy gentle breast,

line_1: But let me from the tender theme refrain,
line_2: While every word but sharpens every pain;

line_1: While every word but sharpens every pain;
line_2: But let me from the tender theme refrain,

line_1: For when the hand that wounds would heal the fore,
line_2: The generous heart will only bleed the more.

line_1: The generous heart will only bleed the more.
line_2: For when the hand that wounds would heal the fore,

line_1: My latest breath for thee a prayer shall sigh,
line_2: If not deserted by myself, I die.

line_1: If not deserted by myself, I die.
line_2: My latest breath for thee a prayer shall sigh,

line_1: No more shall I thy much-lov'd face review;
line_2: Adieu, for ever, best of friends, adieu!
